title: Business property with the land in the heart of Piliyandala town for sale
details: Approximately 17.3Perch valuable land together with all business buildings ,situated on heart of Pliyandala town (Colombo -Horana main road ,adjacent to Pliyandala Police Station )are on sale approximately at SLR Million 130. This is a rare opportunity for any investors to buy a valuable land in centre of Piliyandala town in Sri Lanka. For inspection of the property please contact Rathne on +94770186745. For further information please email: sumane.2010@hotmail.com
